title: Harry and the Lady Next Door
brief_description: The lady next door sings in a high voice that could shatter glass or hurt a dog’s ears. And, she rehearses constantly. Harry tries just about everything to drown out the lady’s singing, but even a mooing herd of cattle and a loud marching band cannot put a stop to the lady’s relentless rhapsodies. An action-packed sequel to “Harry The Dirty Dog.”
